projects.title: Porous Ceramic Bracelet
projects.description: A 3D–printed bracelet exploring negative‑space lattices in clay. It was fired at cone 6 and finished with a walnut‑shell burnish.

projects.title: Coffee‑Ground Composite Vase
projects.description: Up‑cycled coffee grounds mixed with a biodegradable resin to create a lightweight, earthy vessel.
